title: CyTOF assay record
description: A single data record from CyTOF assay batch

cimac_participant_id.$comment: Id of an participant within this clinical trial, that this assay record is based upon.

cimac_sample_id.$comment: Id of an sample within this clinical trial, that this assay record is based upon.

cimac_aliquot_id.$comment: Id of an aliquot within this clinical trial, that this assay record is based upon.

panel_name.description: Standardized CyTOF panel name used for antibody sample development.

instrument.description: Name of CyTOF instrument on which experiment was conducted.

injector.description: Name of Injector component used as part of the CyTOF software

acquisition_buffer.description: Cell staining buffer used for antibody and cell dilution.

average_event_per_second.description: Analysis rate of CyTOF expressions per second.

run_time.description: Length of run time for CyTOF experiment.

notes.description: Any notes pertaining to CyTOF acquisition.

concatenation_version.description: Concatenation of FCS files into a single FCS version number.

normalization_version.description: Version of normalization for CyTOF assay batch.

beads_removed.description: Confirmation of beads being removed after normalization process.

staining_date.description: Date of staining for CyTOF assay slides.

debarcoding_protocol.description: Protocol for the download and installation of the Debarcoder CyTOF software feature.

debarcoding_key.description: Key required for access to the Debarcoding software.

preprocessing_notes.description: Any notes pertaining to preprocessing of CyTOF data.
